name: Shot'em up demo
overview: In the early 90s, when playing shot'em up was fashionable, the (4)seasons team (newly formed) attempted to make prototypes of games of this genre. Despite their efforts, the team decided to abandon the project, dedicate themselves to other genres. In 2010, the team decided to recover a small prototype converting it in a small playable demo, adding scrolling text and a small retro-music!
